archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.5.4d: d) blocking user actions or network transmissions that expose sensitive information (e.g. preventing the copying of database entries into a spreadsheet or the saving of electronic files on removable media)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
